title: Pozzuoli: death of a city
brief_description: Examines the history of volcanic activity in the area surrounding Pozzuoli and the problems of resettlement. Earthquakes have already destroyed 60% of the City. The impending disaster of a volcanic eruption is discussed and compared with the Mt. St Helen’s eruption of 1980, the Mt Pelee disaster in Martinique in 1902 and the eruption of Vesuvius in 79AD.
